parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Widget Title
parameter.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

parameter.name: addition_cls
parameter.label: Addition Class
parameter.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget.

parameter.name: stylecls
parameter.label: Widget Box Style
parameter.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes

parameter.name: ul_cls
parameter.label: UL Class
parameter.description: This class is used for wrapper of list links (ul tag).
